introText: A hooded individual of indeterminate heritage approaches you and offers you the chance to double your money. You can't place their accent, but you definitely recognize their lust for currency.

choices.choiceText: Throw some dice, and wager 10/100/1000 gold. Let's see if you can double this.
Attempt a swindle by suggesting a convoluted arrangement of odds that leaves you more favored.
Refuse to engage in this destructive vice.
